src:
Izgubila oblast nad vozilom
05 Nov 2019, 12:50 by M. Ž.
Včeraj nekaj po 16. uri so policisti pod drobnogled vzeli prometno nesrečo pri Otočcu. Ugotovili so, da je nesrečo povzročila 52-letna voznica osebnega avtomobila, ki je vozila po lokalni cesti iz Rateža proti Otočcu. V ovinku je izgubila oblast nad vozilom, zapeljala levo in trčila v avtomobil, ki ga je iz nasprotne smeri pravilno pripeljal 29-letni voznik. Lažje poškodovano voznico so reševalci odpeljali v bolnišnico.

Po gorivo v tovornjake

Na parkirišču podjetja v Krškem je med 30. oktobrom in včerajšnjim dnem nekdo vlomil v rezervoarja dveh tovornih vozil in iztočil okoli 400 litrov goriva. Nepridiprav je gorivo med 28. oktobrom in ponedeljkom iztočil tudi iz dveh tovornjakov na parkirišču v Novem mestu in povzročil za okoli 400 evrov škode.

Podjetje ob 2000 evrov

Med 30. oktobrom in včerajšnjim dnem je na delovišču v Novem mestu nekdo vlomil v pomožni objekt ter odnesel električno ročno orodje in gradbeni material. Podjetje ocenjuje, da je oškodovano za okoli 2000 evrov.

Pijan in brez vozniške

Nekaj po 20. uri so policisti v Dolenjem Kamenju ustavili voznika osebnega avtomobila in mu zaradi očitnih znakov alkoholiziranosti odredili preizkus. 45-letni kršitelj, ki nima veljavnega vozniškega dovoljenja, je imel v litru izidhanega zraka 0,79 miligramov alkohola. Avtomobil so mu zasegli in o kršitvah z obdolžilnim predlogom seznanili sodišče.

Prijeli pet Alžircev

Policisti so na območju Dobove, Krškega in Brežic izsledili in prijeli pet državljanov Alžirije, ki so nezakonito prestopili državno mejo. Policijski postopki s tujci še potekajo.
text:
Lost control of the vehicle
05 Nov 2019, 12:50 by M. Ž.
Yesterday, shortly after 4pm, police officers scrutinized a traffic accident near Otocec. It was determined that the accident was caused by a 52-year-old passenger car driver who was driving along the local road from Ratez to Otočec. In a bend, she lost control of the vehicle, drove to the left and collided with a 29-year-old driver who had correctly driven it from the opposite direction. The ambulance was taken to hospital by ambulance.

Get the fuel into the trucks

In the parking lot of the company in Krško, between October 30 and yesterday, someone broke into the tank of two trucks and dumped about 400 liters of fuel. Unexpectedly, he also leaked fuel from two trucks in a parking lot in Novo mesto between October 28 and Monday, causing about $ 400 worth of damage.

The company at $ 2000

Between October 30 and yesterday, at a work site in Novo mesto, someone broke into an ancillary facility and took away hand-held power tools and construction materials. The company estimates it has been damaged for around $ 2,000.

Drunk and driverless

Shortly after 8pm, police officers in Dolenj Kamen stopped the driver of the passenger car and ordered him to test due to obvious signs of intoxication. The 45-year-old offender, who did not have a valid driver's license, had 0.79 milligrams of alcohol in a liter of exhaled air. They seized the car and informed the court of the violations with the charge sheet.

Receive five Algerians

Police in the area of Dobova, Krško and Brežice tracked down and apprehended five Algerian citizens who had crossed the state border illegally. Police proceedings with strangers are still ongoing.
